name: Impact I Mining Laser
description:
Manufacturer: Thermyte Concern
Item Type: Mining Laser 
Size: 1
Optimal Range: 30
Maximum Range: 150m
Power Transfer: 2200
Instability: +10%
Resistance: -25%
Optimal Charge Window: +30%
Optimal Charge Rate: +20%
Overcharge Rate: +50%
Shatter Damage: +75%
Extraction Throughput: 0.45 SCU/s
Module Slots: 3
Mine difficult deposits easier and faster with the Impact I. Thermyte Concern created special focus lenses to increase the laser's power and provide the precision required for a larger optimal charge window. This powerful mining laser does require careful management, as deposits will overheat quicker and explode with more force.
description_cn:
制造商:铝热公司\物品类型:采矿激光
尺寸：1
\最佳距离:30米
最大距离：150米
能量传输：2200
不稳定性：+10%
采矿抗性：-25%
充能绿区：+30%
绿区充能速率：+20%
过载速率+50%
爆裂伤害：+75%
提取速率：0.45 SCU/秒
模组插槽：3个
用“冲击I”来把困难的采矿任务变得简单快速。 铝热公司创造了特殊的聚焦镜，以增加激光的功率，并为更大的充能绿区提供所需的精度。这种强大的采矿激光器需要小心操作，因为矿床过热更快，爆炸威力也更大。
